conbody.p: Presently, AirClassroom is able to offer its users two classrooms in Shanks Hall for rent: 180 & 360. Although some classes are held in these rooms throughout the day during the work week, for our purposes, we have secured certain time frames for users to rent the rooms both during day hours and also in the evenings to accommodate their specific needs. Potential customers as well as returning inidividuals or groups can locate these times and a full schedule on our website (AirClassroom.com).

Features that users will find within both Shanks 180 & 360 include:
Apple Macintosh desktop computers
desk space
adjustable and moveable office chairs
teaching station
equipped with a Apple Macintosh desktop computer connected to a doc-cam, a projector, and audio
projector screen
white erase boards with markers
numerous outlets
Virginia Tech wifi
